alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Area of thunderstorms northeast of Soda Springs and Montpelier moving south-southwest through 400 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 9 miles north of Wayan to 11 miles southeast of Henry to 16 miles east of Soda Springs to near Georgetown, moving south- southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Brief heavy rain, wind gusts to 35 mph, pea sized hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible as well as create hazardous boating conditions on Bear Lake and Blackfoot Reservoir. Locations impacted include... Soda Springs, Montpelier, Wayan, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, southern Blackfoot Reservoir, Georgetown, Saint Charles, Dingle, Henry, Paris, Bloomington, Bern, Minnetonka Cave, Ovid, Georgetown Summit, Diamond Creek Campground, Fish Haven, Liberty, Clear Creek Ranger Station and Mill Canyon Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range
